author: solomax
msg: [OPENMEETINGS-1156] allow recording flags from room and soap-login are in effect now

author: stsp
msg: On the pin-externals branch, allow fine-grained API-level control over which
externals get pinned during a copy. This feature is intended for clients which
allow users to select specific externals for pinning, like TortoiseSVN does.
(pin_externals_prop): Add externals_to_pin parameter. If set, only pin
try_copy, svn_client_copy7): Add new externals_to_pin parameter
and pass it all the way down to pin_externals_prop().

author: tilman
msg: PDFBOX-2383: remove copyrighted files that are not used anywhere

author: tommaso
msg: OAK-2455 - fixed xpath query template to match invalid syntax exception

author: stefan2
msg: In FSX, get rid of a pointless function export and fix a revision property
(svn_fs_x__revision_proplist): Remove function that isn't called outside
(change_rev_prop_body): Same. Also, use the correct cache control flag.
